Sentencas: An Ag-26.7Cu-4.5Ti metallic interlayer was used to join yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS) were used to characterize the joint microstructure.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: The bond strength and hermeticity of steel/metallic interlayer/YSZ joints were also evaluated.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: TEM analysis revealed that the Fe from the steel reacted with Ti of the interlayer to form Fe2Ti near the steel/Ag-26.7Cu-4.5Ti interface.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: At the Ag-26.7Cu-4.5Ti interlayer/YSZ interface, Ti2O3 and Fe2Ti4O reaction layers formed near the YSZ and the interlayer, respectively.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: While titanium reacted with oxygen from YSZ to form titanium oxide (Ti2O3), Fe diffused toward the YSZ to react with titanium oxide to form the Fe2Ti4O layer.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: The tensile and shear strengths of the joints, evaluated according to ISO 13124 test method, were 16.7 +/- 4.8 and 40.2 +/- 8.2 MPa, respectively.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: Nano-indentation hardness was characterized across the steel/Ag-26.7Cu-4.5Ti interlayer/YSZ joint.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: The hermeticity of the joint was measured by using He leakage tests.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers

Sentencas: The leak rate of the joined assembly was 1.5 +/- 1.1 x 10(-9) mbar l/s, indicating good hermeticity of joints.
Titulo: Interfacial and mechanical characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steel joints fabricated using Ag-Cu-Ti interlayers
